array.text: All right, rookies. I'm sure you're all aware that the suburbs of Rohan have been teeming with monsters recently.
That's why some nobles have asked us, the Adventurer Alliance, to...
You know... Investigate this sudden flood of monsters.
They're requesting our help for something like that?
What's the Rohan army doing then?
Hehe, you really want to know why, Sarah?
Looks like their little monster problem is way bigger than they expected.
And they're having a hard time getting their defenses ready!
Must be pretty serious then...
Are you sure you don't want to deal with this personally?
Sarah, my dear, being the best bard in the continent comes first.
In fact, I was recently inspired to write a brand-new song.
Someone as elegant as me shouldn't have to handle things in person unless I don't have a choice in the matter!
Besides, outdoor activities aren't good for my skin.
That's why I figured this job would be perfect for you rookies instead!
Ugh... Is it okay for you to be slacking this much as leader of the Adventurer Alliance?
They put me in this position because I was so perfect for the job!
You already know this, Sarah.
All I care about is composing sweet-sounding melodies
and maintaining this absolute beauty of mine.
I'm sorry that our leader is so irresponsible...
But I'm counting on you guys! This mission is vital for all of us.
Looks like the monster outbreak is even worse than we thought.
Still, we were able to get a better grasp of the situation thanks to everyone's bravery!
This should buy Rohan more time to prepare... A job well done!
Sarah, wait. It's too early to celebrate.
We know what numbers we're dealing with...
But we still don't know what the cause of all this is!
I guess your little friends will need to help us once again...
...You're saying you want them to look for what's causing the monster outbreak?
Oscar, that's way too dangerous for rookies!
Can't you just lead us instead?
Why can't you show more responsibility?
Heh, can you really say I'm being irresponsible?
Or am I just appreciating the potential of your friends here?
After all, they look like they'll become some fine adventurers in the future.
But to do that, they need to take on dangerous missions to gain experience.
It's not like I'm just giving them tedious work.
It takes a lot to get a compliment out of me, so you all be flattered.
Then I'm going with them.
Really? Are you sure, Sarah?
I'm dead serious. I've traveled with countless adventurers.
At least I can act as a guide for them!
Hmm... Okay, I expect you to be watching them closely then. I want a full report when you get back.
Who knows, maybe you'll be the next inspiration for my new song!
Okay, now you're just being silly.
All right, everyone! Let's get out there and do our best, so Oscar here feels the urge to write a song!
So, we know that there's been an endless flood of monsters, but...
We still don't have a clue as to what the cause could be.
Sarah!
...Beth?
What brings you here?
Huh? What do you mean?
Oscar asked me to help you, so here I am!
I mean, yeah. You're the best in the alliance when it comes to recon...
That Oscar... Guess he had something in mind after all.
Aw, really? Thanks!
Anyway, are these the rookies he mentioned?
Yup! One day, they'll become fine heroes like you and Oscar!
Wow! Really?
Your words mean a lot to me! Looking forward to working with you all!
Alrighty then, I'll infiltrate their ranks, just like Oscar asked me to.
Do you think you could grab their attention for me?
No problem! Leave it to us!
Nicely done!
Did you manage to find out anything, Beth?
Hmm, not sure...
But?
I think...
I saw some Dragoons!
Dragoons? You mean you saw Draconians?
They must've completely disappeared after the Dragon War...
I definitely saw them though!
And there were a lot!
...Where in the world did they come from?
Beth, I think we'll need to look into this a bit more.
Okay, back to infiltrating I go!
Mind grabbing their attention again like last time?
You got it!
Beth!
We finally caught up with you. Are you okay?
Yep! Fit as a fiddle!
Thanks for luring them out for me! Made my job a lot easier!
And I was right! They were Dragoons, a lot of them in fact!
That's insane. Could Dragons really be involved in all of this?
They went into hiding after losing the Dragon War... Why did they decide to show up now of all times?
We need to let the Adventurer Alliance and Rohan know about this!
I'm on it!
I've got too many monsters on my tail, though!
Could you take care of them for me?
Sure, just leave that to us!
Make sure to let Oscar know about the Draconians too!
Okay, Beth should've escaped safely by now.
We should also get going ourse- Wait, who's that?
Whoa! I thought you were a monster! I almost attacked you.
Judging from your outfit, you're from the Adventurer Alliance. Am I wrong?
Yes. We're investigating the cause of the monster flood.
Monster flood? This ain't no flood... It's a war.
Do you happen to have any clues as to what's going on?
I don't know all the details, but...
All I can tell you is that a massive army of disgusting Orcs is coming this way.
Orcs? Massive army?
Yep, I'm only spouting facts here,
especially since my job is to hunt those things down.
If you don't believe me, see for yourself.
Won't be long now before those disgusting creatures march in!
What? The Orcs are really here!
And the Draconians too! What the heck is going on?
Is this going to be a repeat of the Dragon War?
Rohan is definitely not prepared for an invasion of this magnitude...
Bring it on, you filthy Orcs!
That's the person we saw a while ago!
And she's fighting the Orcs alone!
You there! Don't stand and watch! Run while you still can!
This place is about to turn into a bloodbath.
Run away...?
No! I can't let you fight all by yourself!
Hmph, trying to be all brave at a time like this.
Well, don't just stand there! Follow me!
No! Don't just run in head first like that!
Ugh, let's go everyone!
Hey... Are you hurt?
You shouldn't have jumped in so recklessly like that...
Orcs are a tough bunch to deal with.
...It wasn't the Orcs.
Minotaurs suddenly appeared out of nowhere.
Minotaurs?
They don't usually tag along with the Orcs...
They don't, and that's what confused me.
I barely managed to fend them off, but they're a persistent bunch, so they'll definitely be back.
It won't be long before they get here. I need to get ready for battle...
No, you can't fight in that state!
We'll lead the way. Just stick close to us!
Darn it...
Is everyone ready?
Brace yourselves! This battle's going to be fierce!
Camille, what on earth happened to you....
Ugh, I've got nothing else to say...
I told you that we needed to get in touch with Rohan and ask for their help.
But instead, you insisted on going out there alone, and now look what happened...
Oh, and you are...?
O-Oh, my name is Rebecca.
I'm Camille's old friend, a-and I was worried about her.
She's very shy.
Anyway, nice to meet you Rebecca. Is Camille okay?
Y-Yes! She's safe for now...
But it's going to be dangerous if I don't treat her right away.
The problem is, there are monsters everywhere.
We'll clear the way, so make sure to take her someplace safe!
Thank you... And sorry for the trouble...
Don't be. It's our job to fight monsters anyway.
Everyone, let's go!
T-Thank you so much. Camille is safe now.
The situation could've been much worse for her...
Hmph, it's just a scratch.
Don't be silly, Camille. You could've died out there!
(She doesn't stutter when she talks to her friend.)
I've never seen you this angry, Rebecca. Maybe I made a big mistake.
You did!
You should also say thanks to these people for helping you.
...Thanks. You saved my life.
No worries. Just doing our job.
I appreciate how you fight for Rohan too.
...I only fought for myself.
One thing's for sure though, things definitely aren't normal around here.
R-Right. I've been sensing...Elemental Spirits of sorts.
But only Dragons are capable of summoning them...
Draconians, Minotaurs, and now Elemental Spirits...
Have the Dragons really returned?
That's what we need to find out.
Looks like I'll need to infiltrate deeper into the enemy ranks and...
What are you talking about?! You need to be treated first!
...I really want to fight, but I'd just be a burden to you.
I guess I'll head back to Rohan and let the Adventurer Alliance know how bad the situation is.
Good idea, Camille.
Hmph, but you can bet I'll be back as soon as I'm all patched up.
That'd be a big help!
I hope Oscar realizes how bad things have gotten...
See, I knew you all had things under control!
I told you that I'm a good judge of character, Sarah.
Hey, Oscar!
I-I asked him to come.
I-I thought it'd be best if he saw the situation for himself...
I admit I'm a sucker when it comes to girls like her.
Anyway, there are quite a lot of Elemental Spirits.
The balance of nature will be disrupted if we just let them be.
I don't know. Seems like too much work if you ask me.
What?! That's not something you of all people should be saying!
That's why I came all the way here.
I didn't say I wouldn't take care of this! Am I not even allowed to complain?!
Anyway, Rebecca and I will take care of the Spirits in this area.
You guys go visit Duku.
He may know a thing or two.
Duku? That eccentric wizard?
I heard he's very skilled.
Aren't you on bad terms with him though?
Well... He should know how bad the situation since I'm here in person.
I don't think he'd refuse to cooperate even if he hates me.
Maybe...?
Ugh, you should've made up with him if you weren't sure!
Anyway, let's go... I know where he is.
He should be around here somewhere...
I think the monsters are getting stronger as time passes...
How is Duku able to live alone in a place like this?
Wait, has he already been...?
Haha. You speak nonsense, fairy.
Monsters can never break through my barrier.
Duku. Long time no see.
Quite the contrary. It hasn't been that long.
Fortunately, that arrogant bard isn't here with you.
Ugh, can't you guys patch things up already?
I do agree with the arrogant part, though.
Judging from all of these rookies you've brought with you, I assume you're here because of the monster invasion?
Oscar is all bark and no bite. I know he doesn't have a clue about all this.
Can't argue with that.
Still, how come his way of talking sounds so familiar?
But it's understandable. Rohan is cut off from the outside world because of monsters.
Unfortunately, Fairy, I'm afraid the Chromatic Dragon is about to be resurrected.
Wait, what?!
What terrible timing. Monsters are rushing in as we speak.
We'll continue this discussion once we've defeated them.
Looks like the monster attacks have grown more violent, hahaha.
Duku, what was that thing you mentioned earlier?!
About the Chromatic Dragon resurrecting!
A huge war has already broken out in the central continent.
Only the country bumpkins from Rohan are acting carefree, without realizing what's coming for them.
No way... Then these monsters are...?
Yes, they must be ones that are led by one of the Dragons that serve the Chromatic One.
I bet that ignorant fool Oscar never imagined anything like this would happen.
This is terrible... If the Dragon army makes their way in...
Would Rohan even be able to withstand their attack?
Hang on, you said you set up a barrier for yourself.
Maybe we can use it to stop their advances!
That is absolute blasphemy!
Do I look like I've got much time on my hands?!
Duku, I know you don't get along well with Oscar...
But millions of lives are at stake here!
This has nothing to do with Oscar!
I'm collecting samples of Venom Spiders here.
Studying them will take my magic to the next level.
This is far more important than Rohan's little problem.
How could you say such a thing! You only care about yourself!
In fact, you're just the same as Oscar!
How dare you insult me like that!
How many do you need?
We'll catch them for you!
Hmph, even I have trouble catching those creatures.
Fine then. Try and catch some if you can.
Hear that?
Let's exterminate every Venom Spider in the area!
Here, we caught every Venom Spider we came across.
Good enough for you?
Haha, yes. These shall do quite nicely.
I am now one step closer to finding a solution for my problem.
...Hey! What are you doing? You're supposed to help fend off monsters with us!
Silence! This is a crucial moment for science!
Hey, you crazy old geezer!
...Vanessa?
I can't believe that stupid research of yours is preventing you from seeing what's really important!
Nonsense! I know my priorities! Nothing's more important than my research!
I might as well chop you down here and now.
Vanessa? What brings you here?
That's my line, Sarah. What are you doing in a dangerous place like this?
You see, I'm with these adventurers.
Oh, well I'll be!
Hi. I'm Vanessa from the Adventurer Alliance headquarters.
So, it looks like Duku here is refusing to cooperate, huh.
Old man, I'm going to burn those dead spiders to a crisp if you just sit back and do nothing!
D-Don't you dare!
Look, whatever your research is, can't you save it for AFTER you help get rid of the monsters?!
Haha, even if I do cooperate with you...
Do you think really think the monsters are going to wait for me to place a barrier?
Heh, who do you think I am?
Let's wipe out the monsters so Duku can place a barrier!
Everyone, follow me!
All right, let's go!
Hmph, reckless lot.
How do you like that? You can't use monsters as an excuse anymore.
And Sarah, your friends fought admirably!
Haha, you ignorant fools care about nothing but violence.
Oh stop your complaining. Hurry up and set up that barrier of yours.
We're going to see a more brutal offense coming our way.
Wait, you're telling me they're going to get even stronger?
Vanessa, what do you know about all this?
Those monsters are on their way to occupy the ruins in the far east of Rohan.
Those ruins once served the Green Dragon, the Chromatic Dragon's right hand.
It's also where the Chromatic Dragon's power is still sealed.
The Chromatic Dragon's power? You mean...
Exactly. They're trying to release the seal in the ruins.
Attacking Rohan is just bait to try and draw our attention away.
The headquarters saw through their plan and sent me to Rohan,
so that I could kick Oscar's butt into high gear and get him to be useful for once.
Interesting. They all know what kind of person Oscar is.
But unsealing the ruins and unleashing the Chromatic Dragon's power?
Are they trying to bring about the Dragon War once again?
If that happens, millions of people will lose their lives!
Well, that's why we have the Adventurer Alliance! We're here to stop things like that from happening!
Duku! Hurry up and place the barrier!
I'm working on it! You can't rush science!
Ugh, of all people, why is she the one visiting me...
I'm going to escort Duku while he's placing the barrier.
You guys go on ahead and cut off the monster invasion!
All right!
Over there! I see them!
That's some good eyesight you've got there. We didn't have to find the enemy this early, though...
Oscar!
Sigh... I can't believe I have to come here and get my hands dirty...
Anyway, you guys did a wonderful job.
Oscar, the reason monsters are acting so strangely is...
Oh that? Vanessa already told me.
Plotting to resurrect the Chromatic Dragon? That's the most outrageous thing I've ever heard.
Still, I get it. Things have gotten severe enough for me to have to get involved.
Rebecca and I will head to the ruins and strengthen the seal.
I see. Then let's...!
Sarah, rushing things won't solve everything.
As for yours truly, I prefer a more elegant approach.
What kind of nonsense are you spouting now?!
First, we need to locate the ruins.
Beth went to scout the area, but she hasn't come back yet.
I want you guys to look for her.
...What about you?
Rebecca and I need to save our energy.
Our job is to strengthen the seal once we find the ruins.
I-I don't mind going out there...
Shhh. Just do as I say.
Acting rash just makes things worse.
Ugh, why's he gotta be so untrustworthy...
Well, let's go look for Beth.
Sarah!
Beth! You're all right!
Of course!
I even found the ruins, just like Oscar asked me to!
You're so skilled for your size.
You're wasting your talents by working with Oscar... Why don't you come work for HQ?
Who might you be?
Vanessa! You made it here too!
Yeah, Duku finished placing the barrier,
and I thought you could use more manpower.
Can't let Oscar hog all the spotlight.
So kid, you found the ruins?
Hey, don't call me a kid!
Anyway, they're in the far east!
You can't miss them!
That's right in the middle of enemy territory.
It's gonna be really tough to break through.
Still, I live for these kinds of fights!
Everyone, let's press onward!
...How come everyone in the alliance is so weird?
The monsters won't go down without a fight. Fine by me!
What? How can you be enjoying this?
Because it means that we're heading in the right direction.
Stop staring at me like I'm a total weirdo.
Still fighting in that unrefined style, Vanessa?
Oscar... You're too late. Don't even try to piggyback on this.
Don't you know? The main character always appears for the grand finale!
Still, I guess I can't claim to be the main character this time around...
I honestly didn't expect you guys to do this much.
Imagine a bunch of rookies fighting a major threat at the forefront of the Adventurer Alliance...
Well, I was their leader this whole time!
...Anyway, I witnessed a great adventure that has inspired me to write a new song.
Your achievements will be remembered forever in my lyrics.
How about less talking and more getting ready?
The ruins are right there in front of our noses, but we're still not there yet.
Besides, there'll be nobody to listen to your song if we fail to fend them off!
Woman, you seriously need to learn to speak more elegantly.
But what you're saying is also true. Time for us to take action.
Here we are.
I feel the power of the Chromatic Dragon raging beneath the ruins.
T-The seal has been significantly weakened.
Do you really think that only you and I can stop this?
I mean, a swarm of monsters are already on their way here...
Just focus on strengthening the seal, Rebecca. We'll handle the monsters.
Yeah. We'll be all goners if the seal is broken.
Hmm... This is proving to be quite difficult.
Wish we had a skillful wizard with us...
Haha, I knew it was too much for you.
Old man?! Where the heck did you come from?!
The seal in these ruins is powerful enough to suppress the Chromatic Dragon's power.
You can't strengthen the seal with that pretentious magic of yours.
Follow me. Let me show you the way.
O-Okay!
I hate to admit it... But I can't be an expert in every field.
Maybe I should just follow your lead this time, Duku.
...This is why I hate you.
I can't believe you decided to come all the way here...
Don't get me wrong. I didn't come here to look after you.
I was simply interested in the magic in these ruins.
Okay then, let's get rid of the ruin monsters!
Stop them from disrupting the seal!
We've driven the monsters out of the ruins!
Oscar and Rebecca should be able to strengthen the seal now.
Haha, how strange...
The magic in the ruins belongs to the Green Dragon...
Out of all these monsters, how come I don't see any of the Green Dragon's minions?
...Stop jinxing it.
Monsters always pop out when someone says things like that.
The Green Dragon, huh. I'd love to be able to challenge it someday.
I'm really curious how strong the Dragons are.
Oh, Vanessa...
I'm just saying.
Okay old man, can you place a barrier here?
We don't want to let a single monster inside the ruins.
Haha, trying to exploit me, I see.
Then make sure to protect this area so that my work isn't disrupted.
Camille and I can take care of that.
And you guys... Go on ahead to block off the monsters.
We've gotta keep them out of this area.
Roger that.
Everyone, this is the final stretch. Just a little more, and we've got this!
We did it!
This will keep the seal tight for a while.
But you know how persistent monsters are, hahaha...
Yeah, as long as the Green Dragon is hiding out there, they'll keep attacking us.
They must be cooking up another scheme.
Hmm, let them come! Now that the great Oscar's here...!
I mean, now that the exceptional adventurers recognized by the great Oscar are here...!
Oscar, don't think you can get away from this that easily.
The climax is over, Sarah.
As the main protagonist, I should leave after I get a round of applause.
No one here gave you such a thing!
...Anyway, it's true that we can't let our guard down.
Monsters will keep trying to make their way into the ruins!
Look, someone's coming this way!
There you guys are!
Monsters are swamping the area again!
Guess they want a rematch!
Is everyone ready?
Hmm... I honestly didn't expect a lot from this at first...
But it looks like this epic tale's going to have an equally epic song to go with it!
